verses.kjv: Hear my prayer, O LORD, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.
verses.ct: Listen to my prayer, LORD. Pay attention to my plea for help. Answer me because of your faithfulness and your righteousness.

verses.kjv: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.
verses.ct: Don't put your servant on trial, because no living person can be declared innocent before you.

verses.kjv: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.
verses.ct: My enemy has hunted me down. He has crushed my life into the dust. He has forced me to live in darkness, like those who died long ago.

verses.kjv: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; my heart within me is desolate.
verses.ct: My spirit is completely overwhelmed inside me, and my heart is devastated.

verses.kjv: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.
verses.ct: I think back to the ancient days. I reflect on everything you have done. I consider the work of your hands.

verses.kjv: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.
verses.ct: I reach out my hands to you. My soul thirsts for you like parched ground craves water. Selah.

verses.kjv: Hear me speedily, O LORD: my spirit faileth: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.
verses.ct: Answer me quickly, LORD — my spirit is fading. Don't withdraw your favor from me, or I will become like those who descend into the grave.

verses.kjv: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.
verses.ct: Let me experience your faithful love in the morning, because I put my trust in you. Show me the path I should take, for I offer my soul to you.

verses.kjv: Deliver me, O LORD, from mine enemies: I flee unto thee to hide me.
verses.ct: Rescue me from my enemies, LORD. I run to you for protection.

verses.kjv: Teach me to do thy will; for thou art my God: thy spirit is good; lead me into the land of uprightness.
verses.ct: Teach me to carry out your will, because you are my God. Your spirit is good — guide me on level ground.

verses.kjv: Quicken me, O LORD, for thy name’s sake: for thy righteousness’ sake bring my soul out of trouble.
verses.ct: Restore my life, LORD, for the sake of your name. Because of your righteousness, bring my soul out of trouble.

verses.kjv: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies, and destroy all them that afflict my soul: for I am thy servant.
verses.ct: In your mercy, cut off my enemies and destroy everyone who torments my soul, because I am your servant.
